keyMappings:
unmap <a-f>
unmap <a-m>
unmap t
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap `
unmap O
unmap b
unmap B
unmap T
unmap J
unmap K
unmap gt
unmap gT
unmap g0
unmap g$
unmap yt
unmap X
unmap <<
unmap >>
unmap gs

map x LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map r LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map c LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map o LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map D scrollFullPageDown
map U scrollFullPageUp
map ; scrollPageDown
map q scrollPageUp
map s scrollDown
map a scrollUp
map M Marks.activateGotoMode
